wpPage.title: Whatever you need, we have it.
wpPage.content: The Yard Recording Studios consists of three rooms: a spacious live room, a production & mixing room and a drum room. All wired together for multi-tracking sessions of all kinds.

studioPageFields.listThreeList: Guitars and Basses by Fender Gibson Epiphone Yamaha Dan Electro Ibanez,Glockenspiels,Large selection of fx pedals,Large selection of percussion,Drum kits by Gretsch and Yamaha,Upright Piano,Korg Minilogue
studioPageFields.listTwoList: 16 channels Focusrite I/O,Klark Teknik 76-kt (1176 Clone),UAD 4-710D,Lexicon reverbs and delays,Alesis Compressors,Allen and Heath Zed 24
studioPageFields.listFourList: AKG XLS matching pair,AKG XL2,D112,Sm57 x 4,Sm58 x 3,AKG C451 matching pair,Royer R10 Ribbon
